relation: I've made a comment of my thoughts on the TB series (one of my favs!) at the title page. I didn't quite understand volume 7. If anyone wants to tell me their impressions on it, please do. ________________ "No one has ever written, painted, sculpted, modelled, built, or invented except literally to get out of hell." ~ Antonin Artaud
What exactly didn't you understand? Here in Germany TB came out in 5 thick small volumes, so I'm not sure which scenes you're talking about xD;;

Have you read x/1999, because the story pretty much continues on from there. If you stop at Tokyo Babylon, its going to seem kind of like a cliff hanger and be a little confusing. I myself didn't fully understand tokyo babylon until the second time I read it, and that was a long time ago, so I don't remember much of it besides the basics. ________________
